      • task

        @Deprecated
public static void task(String task,
                                     Consumer<ScheduledExecutorService> scheduled,
                                     int everySeconds)
        Deprecated. 
        Start an Async single thread task every x seconds. Replacement for Timer.
        Parameters:
        task - The name of the task to run
        scheduled - The consumer that accepts the Executor as parameter.
        everySeconds - the amount of seconds the task will take to loop.
